title: Could anyone please identify this font for me?
content:
Hi, I’m new here and I was wondering which font was this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015212522im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/02%20(2)_4552.jpg)

I’ve wanted to know for yearsss, I even asked the mag, but they didnt even reply! \>\_\_\_\_\<

Much help appreciated.

 [‹ Typeface for adventure show](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015212522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47057 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alternatives to Franklin Gothic, Trade Gothic, and News Gothic ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015212522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18671 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sheninagans

comments.content: I tried searching for monolines like this, but found no exact match. Its possible it may be a proprietary font of someone’s. i say “someone’s because proprietary fonts have a way of escaping the premises into the public. A similar style that is nice is Charles Borges’ [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/louisiana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015212522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/louisiana/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/louisiana/")
I have ’Louisiana’ on my computer, it’s a really pretty font but it’s just not the same with the font I requested above ^ oh well,
